name: Hellper
description: Hellper bot aims to orchestrate the process and resolution of incidents, reducing the time spent with manual tasks and ensuring that the necessary steps are fulfilled in the right order. Also, it facilitates the measurement of impact and response rate through metrics.

HELLPER_POSTMORTEM_GAP_DAYS.description: Gap in days between resolve and postmortem event

HELLPER_NOTIFY_ON_RESOLVE.description: Notify the Product channel when resolve the incident

HELLPER_NOTIFY_ON_CLOSE.description: Notify the Product channel when close the incident

HELLPER_NOTIFY_ON_CANCEL.description: Notify the Product channel when cancel the incident

HELLPER_OAUTH_TOKEN.description: Slack Token to execute oauth actions

HELLPER_REMINDER_OPEN_NOTIFY_MSG.description: Notify message when status is open
HELLPER_REMINDER_OPEN_NOTIFY_MSG.value: Incident Status: Open - Update the status of this incident, just pin a message with status on the channel.

HELLPER_REMINDER_RESOLVED_NOTIFY_MSG.description: Notify message when status is resolved
HELLPER_REMINDER_RESOLVED_NOTIFY_MSG.value: Incident Status: Resolved - Update the status of this incident, just pin a message with status on the channel.

HELLPER_REMINDER_OPEN_STATUS_SECONDS.description: Contains the time for the stat reminder to be triggered when status is open, by default the time is 2 hours if there is no variable

HELLPER_REMINDER_RESOLVED_STATUS_SECONDS.description: Contains the time for the stat reminder to be triggered when status is resolved, by default the time is 24 hours if there is no variable

HELLPER_PRODUCT_LIST.description: List of all products splitted by semicolon
HELLPER_PRODUCT_LIST.value: Your Product X;Your Product Y;Your Product Z

HELLPER_SLACK_SIGNING_SECRET.description: Slack signs the requests confirming that each request comes from Slack by verifying its unique signature.

FILE_STORAGE.description: Hellper file storage for postmortem document

HELLPER_SLA_HOURS_TO_CLOSE.description: Number of hours between the incident resolution and Hellper reminder to close the incident

ENFORCE_SSL.description: If you running in HTTPS this variable forces redirect to HTTPS when user access with HTTP
